name: FightX Championship Fight Pro
description:
OXO3D presents FightX Championship Fighting Game. This is a free fighting game with legendary blade! Enjoy this free classic fighting arcade games.

Cheng is the main fighter of this Game and the master of samurai blade. FightX Championship Fighting Game is a nail-biting mix of RPG and classical Fighting. All Heroes equipped with countless lethal weapons & rare armor sets with dozens of life like-animated Martial Arts techniques. You need to crush your enemies, humiliate demon bosses, and be the one to close the Gate of Shadows. Do you have what it takes to kick, punch, jump, and slash your way to victory? There’s only one way to find out.

WE LOVE TO HEAR:
* If you like this FightX Championship Fight Pro, then Rate and Review and if something went wicked or you have any recommendation then please give your valued feedback at mailto:3d@oxoapps.com.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR CUSTOMERS:
* This is free game especially for Fighting, Action and Role Play games lovers.
